title: Nuclear theory and energy
creator_credit: David Jay and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: This film concentrates on the application of radioctivity more than the theory. It shows CT scanning, radioctive dating, fusion power and the safety of radioctive products. It also looks critically at nuclear power issues. (NB It is pre-Chernobyl).
